title: No game modes working?
body:
There is currently an issue that I am experiencing where once teams have been chosen, the client never takes the teams to the login screen. At this stage the chat function still works (filled with competitor rage) and you are forced to exit the client to find another solution. Once relogged, there is no mention of that game existing and now when selecting "Find Match"; in the only game mode available (Blind Pick) - nothing happens. 

Any assistance would be great. Any comments whether other players are experiencing these issues would also provide some reassurance. 

Furthermore, it would be great to be provided with more detailed reasoning, personally and proactively (on Riot's behalf), regarding the status of the individuals game client and servers.

Malteza

replies.body:
Hi folks - just an update here.

There was an incident on the OCE server earlier this morning (which lines up with when you got initially stuck in games / champ select). This left some players in "ghost games", where different parts of the server think you are in a game, when you are not.

Unfortunately, there's no way for us to re-sync this information without restarting the entire OCE platform. It will eventually self-resolve, once those games expire, which in normal circumstances should take approximately 3 hours.

TL;DR - it should be fixed for each of you within the next hour.

> [{quoted}](name=Agent Mindstar,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=ZX7l6hWV,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2018-05-23T01:46:34.536+0000)
>
> Hi folks - just an update here.
> 
> There was an incident on the OCE server earlier this morning (which lines up with when you got initially stuck in games / champ select). This left some players in "ghost games", where different parts of the server think you are in a game, when you are not.
> 
> Unfortunately, there's no way for us to re-sync this information without restarting the entire OCE platform. It will eventually self-resolve, once those games expire, which in normal circumstances should take approximately 3 hours.
> 
> TL;DR - it should be fixed for each of you within the next hour.

and the reason this information came to us so late is?

Hey Trikki

So unfortunately we dropped the ball here when it comes to the initial incident and follow-up to it.   We didn't communicate within Riot as well as we normally do, which led to some of us not seeing the fallout from the issue (ie. the ghost games you've been reporting) as quickly as normal.  While it likely wouldn't have changed the outcome, we could have been much more on the ball in getting the message out to you guys.  That last part is pretty important as we always want you to know what is going on.

Hopefully the ghost games fix up soon for you :)

Cheers
Mindstar
Ask for your subscription fees back

Thanks for letting us know about this guys - we're looking into the cause now.

I have same issue.

After trying to queue a Norm while waiting for Ranked queues... I never entered game it timed out we were all stuck in lobby.

Not I can not enter any type of game mode. "Find Match" does not enter queue.

Of note: Practice Tool says I am in game.

Cheers
Hello any response Riot? It's office hours, I'm sure someone is around to give us some feedback??

Nothing as of yet. I see players on my friends list who are getting into games which confuses me. Running the repair kit. 

Poor customer service really turns me off games ><
It will be just us in the game that crashed i think other people on my fl can q as well so probs just that 10 man squad we were in

Yeah afew Hours ago i stuck in Champ Select with afew people the game never started so all of us left the lobby when i re open the client when i try search any Mode Blind Pick or Ranked it just doesn't start the Search Q so please help
was this a blind pick normal game?
i was in a blind pick normal when champ select crashed we all left an re logged and still thinks were in a game
probably all from the same game... super frustrating
